review: I'm so happy I got this.  Only had a little glitch when installing Netflix.  It seems there's an update that you must download for the Fire TV in order for it to work.  Once I figured that out everything went smoothly.  I don't have a lot of the other apps because I'm happy with Prime and Netflix.  Works great.  I don't have a smart TV so this is perfect for our needs.
